Question: This person has been an outspoken critic of the Iraq War before the war began in March 2003.
Hints: This person also trained with Jean Shelton at the Shelton Actors Lab in San Francisco.
Danny Lebern **** (born July 22, 1946) is an American actor, film director and political activist.
On April 6, 2009, this person was given a chieftaincy title in Imo State, Nigeria.
